item.title: Video related to PDO exam controversy in Raichur goes viral
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: A video showing the events surrounding the PDO examination boycott at Sindhanur on Nov 11, where candidates protested due to the delayed distribution of examination question papers, has gone viral on social media.The situation at Sindhanur First Grade Degree College became tense when one examination hall received only 12 question papers instead of the necessary 24. Students refused to participate in the examination, particularly concerned that the question paper envelope was not unseale...]]>
item.author: Tnn
